styles.font: Atlassian Sans, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, sans-serif

text.literalString: Fannie Mae Form 1004 / Freddie Mac Form 70
This form is designed to report an appraisal of a one-unit property or a one-unit property with an accessory unit.

label.literalString: Is this a PUD (Planned Unit Development)?

text.literalString: Analyze the contract for sale for the subject purchase transaction.

label.literalString: Is the property seller the owner of public record?
Is there any relationship between parties?
Is property currently offered for sale?

text.literalString: Describe the neighborhood characteristics and market conditions.

label.literalString: Is the highest and best use as improved the present use?
Adverse Site Conditions (easements, encroachments, environmental conditions, etc.)

text.literalString: There are comparable properties currently offered for sale and comparable sales within 12 months prior to the effective date of this appraisal in the subject neighborhood.
Indicated Value by Sales Comparison Approach

I certify that, to the best of my knowledge and belief: The statements of fact contained in this report are true and correct. The reported analyses, opinions, and conclusions are limited only by the reported assumptions and limiting conditions and are my personal, impartial, and unbiased professional analyses, opinions, and conclusions.

label.literalString: I did personally inspect the interior and exterior of the subject property
I did not personally inspect the exterior of the subject property from the street
